channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13465] Add ZK settings to MiniLlapCluster clusterSpecificConfiguration
item.description: HIVE-13365 added zookeeper support to MiniLlapCluster. These settings should also be added to the clusterSpecificConfiguration to make whoever created the mini cluster gets their confs updated with this info.
item.summary: Add ZK settings to MiniLlapCluster clusterSpecificConfiguration

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: sseth can you review? Small patch on top of your changes for HIVE-13365.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12797806/HIVE-13465.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 36 tests failed

ATTACHMENT ID: 12797806 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

I don't believe these failures are related to the patch. I've rerun all of these tests and they've passed, with the exception of TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver, which doesn't seem to initialize properly. However that test should not be affected by changes in MiniLlapCluster.

I'm going to commit this patch.
